description:
Position Title: Senior Sales Executive

Company: Corrugated Manufacturer (Must have Corrugated experience)

Location: Georgia, United States (Remote)

Salary: $120-160K

Overview:

We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Senior Sales Executive to join a market leading Corrugated Manufacturer. As a Senior Sales Executive, you will play a crucial role in driving sales growth and expanding our market presence across the East Coast. You will be responsible for cultivating relationships with existing clients, identifying new business opportunities, and effectively communicating the value of our products and services.

Responsibilities:

-Develop and implement strategic sales plans to achieve company sales targets and objectives.

-Identify and pursue new business opportunities within markets such as FMCG, Distributors, Manufacturing and more.

-Build and maintain strong relationships with existing clients to ensure customer satisfaction and retention.

-Conduct market research to identify emerging trends, competitive activities, and customer needs.

-Ability to collaborate with the multiple teams (Production, Technical, Customer Service and Management) to provide the best possible service to our customers.

-Attend industry trade shows, conferences, and networking events to promote company products and services.

-Prepare and deliver sales proposals, quotations, and contracts to prospective clients.

-Negotiate pricing, terms, and agreements with customers to maximize profitability.

-Provide regular sales forecasts, reports, and updates to management.

-Stay informed about industry developments, technological advancements, and regulatory changes affecting the corrugated packaging market.

-Maintain a high level of professionalism, integrity, and ethical standards in all interactions with customers, colleagues, and stakeholders.

Qualifications:

-Proven track record of success in B2B sales within the corrugated packaging industry.

-Minimum of 3 years of experience in a senior sales role, preferably with a focus on Paper, Packaging and Manufacturing.

-Strong business acumen and understanding of sales principles, techniques, and strategies.

-Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.

-Ability to build and maintain long-term relationships with clients and internal stakeholders.

-Results-driven mindset with a passion for exceeding sales targets and achieving goals.

-Proficiency in Microsoft Office suite and CRM software.

-Willingness to travel as needed to meet with clients and attend industry events.

-Valid driver's license and clean driving record.

Apply now with your resume and cover letter outlining your qualifications and why you are the ideal candidate for this position.
